name: StopWordsRemover
description: Filters out stop words from input. Null values from input array are preserved unless adding null to stopWords explicitly.

fields.name: inputCol
fields.title: Input Column
fields.description: Column containing the array text from which the stop words have to be removed

fields.name: outputCol
fields.title: Output Column
fields.description: Contains array of text by dropping list of stop words

fields.name: stopWords
fields.title: Comma Separated List of Custom Stop Words. If not provided, the default list of stop words would be used.
